const response = await client.search({
  query: {
    match: {
      "user.id": "kimchy",
    },
  },
});
console.log(response);

const response1 = await client.search({
  index: "_all",
  query: {
    match: {
      "user.id": "kimchy",
    },
  },
});
console.log(response1);

const response2 = await client.search({
  index: "*",
  query: {
    match: {
      "user.id": "kimchy",
    },
  },
});
console.log(response2);
